Header: President underscores need to carry forward the Freedom Party in a strong manner
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena joined in an inspection visit to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Head Office this morning. The President after arriving at the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Head Office met representatives of the Women Organization, the Youth Organization, the Lawyers Association, the Graduates Association, the Graduates Association and the Professionals Association. The President joined in inspecting the offices of these Organizations. The President examined the active contribution of all these organizations affiliated to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party. The President pointed out the importance of carrying forward the Sri Lanka Freedom Party as a strong peopleâ€™s party.
